alert.note: Alert for Sawtooth, Stanley Basin (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 17 at 2:34PM MDT until April 18 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches above 7500 feet elevation and 3 to 6 inches below 7500 feet. Locally higher amounts expected along ridgetops. * WHERE...The Sawtooths and Stanley Basin, including but not limited to Banner Summit, Stanley, and Galena Summit. * WHEN...Until 3 PM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely be snow covered and slick at times, with periods of reduced visibility.
info.instruction: If traveling or commuting, slow down, leave plenty of extra space between you and other vehicles, and plan extra time to reach your destination. The latest road conditions can be obtained via 511.idaho.gov, the Idaho 511 App, or by calling 5 1 1.
